import "./App.css"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import logo from "./logo.png"; import {AiOutlineMenu} from 'react-icons/ai'; import {AiOutlineUser} from 'react-icons/ai'; import LineChart from "./LineChart"; import RadarChart from "./RadarChart"; import PieChart from "./PieChart"; import BarChart from "./BarChart"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { Card,Container, Button,Row,Col,Nav, Navbar, Offcanvas, NavDropdown, Form} from "react-bootstrap"; function App() { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return ( <> {' '} Offcanvas

Annual Sales Some quick summary of annual sales for year 2022 - department A and Department B Yearly Budget Track expenses to manage your event budget online for free. Global Market Share A company's market share is its sales measured as a percentage of an industry's total revenues. Annual Growth Rate The compound annual growth rate (CAGR) measures an investment's annual growth rate over a period of time. ) ; } export default App;
